name: ouro-BOO-ros
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a loop

Rules:

The snake always tries to catch its own tail.
Move the rocks with the ghost to modify the path the snake takes.
Food makes the snake grow in size.
You win if the snake catches its own tail.

Controls:
Arrow keys / WASD: Move the Ghost.
R: Reset the level.
N: Skip to the next level

Made by:
Glimmer
NekuSoul
Sznap
